about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of "Twin Blades of the Three Kingdoms," featuring vibrant 8-bit retro music that complements the world of the game.

With a collection of 23 tracks!

This soundtrack includes all the music heard in the game, including field BGM, victory fanfare, and battle themes. Immerse yourself in the meticulously crafted sounds by BUNBUN, the talented composer.

Included are high-quality music files!

Featuring not only MP3 data but also pristine WAV files.
